MonsterTrait.Name: Fey Ancestry
MonsterTrait.Text: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

MonsterTrait.Name: Innate Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text: The drow's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: dancing lights 1/day each: darkness, faerie fire, levitate (self only)

MonsterTrait.Name: Sunlight Sensitivity
MonsterTrait.Text: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The drow makes two shortsword attacks.

MonsterAction.Name: Shortsword
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) poison damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Hand Crossbow
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned for 1 hour. If the saving throw fails by 5 or more, the target is also unconscious while poisoned in this way. The target wakes up if it takes damage or if another creature takes an action to shake it awake.

MonsterTrait.Name: Parry
MonsterTrait.Text: The drow adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the drow must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
